if.test: jdh != null and jdh != '' and orgJgid != '01000000'

mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.dwmc dwmc, t.jxdwlx jxdwlx, t.dwdz dwdz, t.dwgk dwgk, t.xzqh xzqh, t.zbdh zbdh, t.xfgx xfgx, t.xqfzr xqfzr, t.xqfzrdh xqfzrdh, t.jzfl jzfl, t.jzsl jzsl, t.zdmj zdmj, t.jzmj jzmj, t.lon lon, t.lat lat, t.plqkd plqkd, t.plqkn plqkn, t.plqkx plqkx, t.plqkb plqkb, t.gnfqms gnfqms, t.zdbwms zdbwms, t.zbxftd zbxftd, t.bz bz, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4, t.sjzt sjzt, t.shzt shzt, t.shrid shrid, t.shrmc shrmc, t.shrzw shrzw, TO_CHAR(t.shsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') shsj
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_JXCS_JBXX t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name jxdwlxmc, c4.code_name xzqhmc, c6.code_name jzflmc, dz.DZJC xfgxmc, c8.code_name sjztmc, c10.code_name shztmc FROM YAGL_JXCS_JBXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JXDWLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jxdwlx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.xzqh = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'JZFL' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c5.CODEID = c6.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzfl = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join YAGL_XFDZ dz On dz.DZID = t.xfgx And dz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'YAZT' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.SJZT = c8.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c9 on c9.CODETYPE = 'YASHZT' And c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c10 On c10.CODEID = c9.CODEID And c10.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.SHZT = c10.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
ORDER BY NVL(xgsj,cjsj) DESC

SELECT , c2.code_name jxdwlxmc, c4.code_name xzqhmc, c6.code_name jzflmc, dz.DZJC xfgxmc, c8.code_name sjztmc, c10.code_name shztmc FROM YAGL_JXCS_JBXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JXDWLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jxdwlx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.xzqh = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'JZFL' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c5.CODEID = c6.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzfl = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join YAGL_XFDZ dz On dz.DZID = t.xfgx And dz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'YAZT' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.SJZT = c8.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c9 on c9.CODETYPE = 'YASHZT' And c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c10 On c10.CODEID = c9.CODEID And c10.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.SHZT = c10.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.UUID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_JXCS_JBXX(uuid,dwmc,jxdwlx,dwdz,dwgk,xzqh,zbdh,xfgx,xqfzr,xqfzrdh,jzfl,jzsl,zdmj,jzmj,lon,lat,plqkd,plqkn,plqkx,plqkb,gnfqms,zdbwms,zbxftd,bz,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4,sjzt,shzt,shrid,shrmc,shrzw,shsj) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jxdwlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwgk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfgx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xqfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xqfzrdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzfl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zdmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{jzmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{plqkd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{plqkn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{plqkx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{plqkb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gnfqms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdbwms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbxftd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE},#{sjzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shrzw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{shsj,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_JXCS_JBXX t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.UUID = #{value}

UPDATE YAGL_JXCS_JBXX
dwmc=#{dwmc}, jxdwlx=#{jxdwlx}, dwdz=#{dwdz}, dwgk=#{dwgk}, xzqh=#{xzqh}, zbdh=#{zbdh}, xfgx=#{xfgx}, xqfzr=#{xqfzr}, xqfzrdh=#{xqfzrdh}, jzfl=#{jzfl}, jzsl=#{jzsl}, zdmj=#{zdmj}, jzmj=#{jzmj}, lon=#{lon}, lat=#{lat}, plqkd=#{plqkd}, plqkn=#{plqkn}, plqkx=#{plqkx}, plqkb=#{plqkb}, gnfqms=#{gnfqms}, zdbwms=#{zdbwms}, zbxftd=#{zbxftd}, bz=#{bz}, delete_flag=#{deleteFlag},
xgrid=#{xgrid}, xgrmc=#{xgrmc}, xgsj=sysdate, datasource=#{datasource},
sjc=TO_DATE(#{sjc},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), reserve1=#{reserve1}, reserve2=#{reserve2}, reserve3=#{reserve3}, reserve4=TO_DATE(#{reserve4},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjzt=#{sjzt}, shzt=#{shzt}, shrid=#{shrid}, shrmc=#{shrmc}, shrzw=#{shrzw}, shsj=TO_DATE(#{shsj},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss')
WHERE UUID = #{uuid}
mapper.select:
SELECT , c8.code_name sjztmc, c10.code_name shztmc FROM YAGL_JXCS_JBXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'YAZT' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.SJZT = c8.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c9 on c9.CODETYPE = 'YASHZT' And c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c10 On c10.CODEID = c9.CODEID And c10.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.SHZT = c10.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name jxdwlxmc, c4.code_name xzqhmc, c6.code_name jzflmc, dz.DZJC xfgxmc, c8.code_name sjztmc, c10.code_name shztmc FROM YAGL_JXCS_JBXX t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'JXDWLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jxdwlx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.xzqh = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'JZFL' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c5.CODEID = c6.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.jzfl = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join YAGL_XFDZ dz On dz.DZID = t.xfgx And dz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'YAZT' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c8.CODEID = c7.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.SJZT = c8.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c9 on c9.CODETYPE = 'YASHZT' And c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c10 On c10.CODEID = c9.CODEID And c10.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.SHZT = c10.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.sjzt != '01' ORDER BY NVL(xgsj,cjsj) DESC
